articles.author: Abigail Lee
articles.title: ‘White Lotus’ Star Aimee Lou Wood Pitched Mike White an American Accent for Her Character, But Stuck With ‘My Manchester One’, Adds ‘No Americans Have My Teeth’ - Variety
articles.description: Aimee Lou Wood says that she often doesn't come across as an American because of one specific tell: her teeth.
articles.content:
Unlike many of the characters in “The White Lotus” Season 3, Chelsea isn’t American. She’s from Manchester, just like the actor who portrays her, Aimee Lou Wood.
Wood said that creator Mike White pr… [+1178 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: Christina Larson
articles.title: Wombats are cute, furry marsupials — that shouldn’t be picked up - The Associated Press
articles.description: Wombats are furry, nocturnal marsupials found only in Australia. Baby wombats have recently been in the news after an American influencer filmed herself snatching a young joey from its mother, setting off a global conversation about mistreatment of wildlife. …
articles.content:
